Compact aggregate extensions for nORM using numeric generics

Manages a single database connection in an asynchronous and thread-safe manner.

Represents the topology of database nodes used for failover and read replica support.

Exception thrown when an optimistic concurrency conflict is detected.

DbContext

DbContextTransaction

EntityEntry

Json

Provides helper methods for working with JSON values in queries. These methods act as markers for the query translator and are not intended to be executed directly.

Norm

NormAsyncExtensions

High-performance extension methods for nORM async operations These are specifically designed for nORM queries to avoid conflicts with other ORMs

NormAsyncPolicy

Provides configuration for async context flow within nORM.

Exception thrown when nORM configuration is invalid or incomplete.

NormConnectionException
